trends: There have been no other sightings in Templeton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsthe first object I saw (approx 4pm EST) was when I was coming from my back yard to the front yard (west to east)and I happened to look up to see a white orb about 500' up moving east with lightning fast speed zoom across the sky and just before it went out of sight it split into two orbs moving away from one another at a 45 degree angle. 10 min later while coming out of my basement door I looked up again to see 4 white orbs in a "missing man" boomerang formation heading west and they just faded from view, they just vanished into thin air and not by shooting out of view - they just disappeared. I live directly under the approach path to Logan Airport (east of my location) in central mass (templeton, ma). they were just pure white orbs and they were NOT convention aircraft in any way. this is my first EVER sighting of an aerial anomoly. I took no photos of the sighting.
Summary: saw white orbs in formation + saw orb split into two
